Sylvia Bambala Chalikosa (amụrụ na 29 Machị na afo 1964) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Zambia, onye otu Patriotic Front
Ọ bụ onye omeiwu maka Mpika Central constituency ma ọ bụ Minista na-ahụ maka ọrụ na ngwongwo ugbu a.
Chalikosa rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ego na SawPower Company Limited
N'abalị iri na otu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2016, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye otu Patriotic Front (PF) ka ọ sọọ mpi maka oche na National Assembly of Zambia ma nọchite anya mpaghara Mpika Central

Mgbe ọ ghọsịrị onye otu Kọmitii Nchebe Mba na Kọmitii Mmekọrịta Mba Ọzọ nke Nzukọ Mba, Onye isi ala Edgar Lungu họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi ala ya n'ọnwa Ọktoba na afo 2016 wee weghara ọkwa Minista maka osote onye isi ala Inonge Wina. N'afọ 2019, onye isi ala Edgar Chagwa Lungu wegara ya n'ọfịs nke Ministry of Works and Supply.
